name: Art Champs
description:
Draw as fast as you can to beat the competition and claim victory!

Art Champs is a fast paced drawing game. Compete against others in the race to complete as many drawings as possible!

Art Champs features:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Fantastic graphics
- New words to unlock!
- Competitive play

Machine Learning Code, models and Draw training dataset based on Google’s “Quick, Draw!” https://github.com/googlecreativelab/quickdraw-dataset

Licenses: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
